namespace Phergie\Irc\Client\React;

/**
 * React client exception.
 *
 * @category Phergie
 * @package Phergie\Irc
 */
class Exception extends \Exception
{
    /**
     * An attempt to establish a connection to a server failed
     */
    const ERR_CONNECTION_ATTEMPT_FAILED = 1;
}
